评论详情: Surprisingly great quality, worth the price

评论概述: Fit sucks and not true to size
评论详情: I ordered a large and got Sept 20th but was out of town on biz so only tried them on Oct 22nd, 2 days after return window.  The pants look cool DEF not Large and more likely a medium and you need an XL or bigger as pant size is off. very disappointing I bought the see and can’t return when they don’t even fit on my leg…  Do better.

This is a costume jacket, but it is also a real jacket.  Bought XXL based on the assessment that it runs "true to size." Is a little snug, but it fits.  I do wish I had gotten 3XL.  Will keep you warm, and looks the way it says it will.
I’m 5’8 and wear a medium in women so I brought this small and it fits perfect. It is thick as well !!! I love it

评论概述: Very tight in the hips. Order larger size.
评论详情: Pants are nice, byt very tight around the hips unless your frame is skinny and non athletic. I am fit and athletic. May not ever be able to wear them.
The jacket arrived on time for my grandsons birthday.  Jacket fits my 13 year old grandson with some room for growth.
Sizing is way off and seller wouldn't follow through with a refund. Now I'm out $100 for these ridiculous pants and have absolutely nothing to do with them.
The pants stated a size medium instead of extra -large.

评论概述: I like it but zipper was broke.
评论详情: The outfit was nice on me just had to get zipper fixed. But I did get refunded some money back.

I absolutely love this jacket! I think its far past costume quality. It has a nice weight to it. Perfect for the spring or fall. It is a little too big. Its a man's size small and I am about 123lbs 5'3'' however, that is not a deal breaker. Looks cool with leggings, boots or fly sneakers. Whoot!
